TopicTitle: How do I place control surfaces behind delta wings?

Articles.Content:
I am trying to build my first spaceplane, but when I try to place the control surfaces behind the delta wings, they always end up at a weird angle.

Please Help,

777-300ER

Use the WSADQE keys to rotate the part in 90 deg increments and hold shift for 15 degree increments.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
